CHANGELOG:

2014-11-18 
Initial release.

2014-12-04
Podio added the wrapper .app-view with max-width set to 1440px. This limits your table width. Bad if you want to use your table to the fullest. Particularly bad if you zoom out, then 1440px css pixels are far less device pixes!
Added counter measure: .app-view { max-width: initial !important; }
